import {FirebaseContext} from '../Firebase/index' import React,{useState,useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function ForgetPasswd() { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const firebase = useContext(FirebaseContext) const submit =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() firebase.auth.passwordReset(email) } const BtnFinish = email !== '' ? () : () return (

Mot de passe oublier ?

setEmail(e.target.value)} />
{BtnFinish}
Inscrit ? connectez-vous
) } export default ForgetPasswd
